name: BCA Virtual Account
description: Only accept payment from Bank BCA

payment_method_instructions.title: ATM BCA
instructions: Insert your BCA ATM card and PIN
Select Menu 'Other Transaction' > Select 'Transfer' > Select 'To BCA Virtual Account'
Enter Virtual Account Number
Verify Virtual Account details
Enter amount to be transferred > Select 'Correct' to confirm
Confirm your transaction details displayed
Select 'Yes' if the details are correct or 'No' if the details are not correct

payment_method_instructions.title: m-BCA (BCA Mobile)
instructions: Log in to the BCA Mobile application
Select the m-BCA menu > Select m-Transfer > BCA Virtual Account
Enter your Virtual Account Number 700701589960110512 > Press 'OK'
Click on 'Send' button at the top right corner to proceed
Click 'OK' to proceed
Enter your PIN to authorize the transaction

payment_method_instructions.title: Internet Banking BCA
instructions: Login to KlikBCA Individual https://ibank.klikbca.com
Select 'Transfer' > Select 'Transfer to BCA Virtual Account'
Enter the Virtual Account Number
Select 'Continue' to proceed your payment
Enter 'RESPON KEYBCA APPLI 1' shown in your BCA Token > Click on the 'Send' button
Enter the authentication token code

name: Mandiri Virtual Account
description: Only accept payment from Bank Mandiri

payment_method_instructions.title: ATM MANDIRI
instructions: Insert your ATM card > Enter PIN > Select 'ENTER'
Select 'PAYMENT' > Select 'MULTI PAYMENT'
Enter company code '88908' > Enter Virtual Account Number > Press 'CORRECT'
Merchant details will be displayed, choose number 1 according to the amount billed and then press 'YES'
Payment confirmation will be displayed. Select 'YES', to proceed
Keep your receipt as proof of payment

payment_method_instructions.title: m-Banking (New Livin by MANDIRI)
instructions: Open Livin by Mandiri > Enter your PASSWORD or do face verification
Select 'Payment' > Search “Xendit 88908”
Select Xendit 88908 as service provider > Enter your Virtual Account Number
Review and confirm the transaction details
Complete the transaction by entering your MPIN
Upon successful payment, save the transaction receipt or screenshot the screen as a proof of payment

payment_method_instructions.title: Internet Banking MANDIRI
instructions: Go to Mandiri Internet Banking website https://ibank.bankmandiri.co.id
Login with your USER ID and PASSWORD
Go to the Home page > Select 'Payment' > Select 'Multi Payment'
Select 88908 XENDIT as service provider
Enter your Virtual Account Number > Press continue
If all details are correct > Click on 'CONFIRM' > Enter PIN / Challenge Code Token
Upon successful payment, save the transaction receipt or screenshot the screen as a proof of payment

name: BNI Virtual Account
description: Only accept payment from Bank BNI

payment_method_instructions.title: ATM BNI
instructions: Insert your ATM card and PIN
Select 'Other Transaction' > Select 'Transfer' > Select the type of account you are using to transfer (i.e. from Savings account)
Choose 'Virtual Account Billing'
Enter virtual account number
The amount billed will show on the screen > Confirm the transaction, if it's correct then continue
Your transaction is completed

payment_method_instructions.title: Mobile Banking BNI
instructions: Enter your User ID and Password
Select the menu 'Transfer' > Select the menu 'Virtual Account Billing' > Choose debit account
Enter your Virtual Account Number
The amount billed will show on the screen > Confirm the transaction and enter your password
Your transaction is completed

payment_method_instructions.title: Internet Banking BNI
instructions: Enter the following address https://ibank.bni.co.id > Click Enter
Enter your User ID and Password
Select the menu 'Transfer' > Select the menu 'Virtual Account Billing'
Enter your Virtual Account number
Choose the type of account you are using to transfer and press 'Continue'
The amount billed will show on the screen > Enter the authentication token code
Your transaction is completed

name: BRI Virtual Account
description: Only accept payment from Bank BRI

payment_method_instructions.title: ATM BRI
instructions: Insert the card > Select the language > Enter your PIN
Select 'Other Menu' > Select 'Payment'
Select 'Other Payment' > Select 'Briva'
Enter virtual account number and the nominal that you want to pay
Check the transaction data and press 'YES'
Your transaction is completed

payment_method_instructions.title: Mobile Banking BRI
instructions: Enter your User ID and PIN
Select 'Payment' > Select 'Briva'
Enter your Virtual Account Number and the amount that you want to pay
Input your PIN > Click 'Send'
Your transaction is completed

payment_method_instructions.title: Internet Banking BRI
instructions: Login to https://ib.bri.co.id/ib-bri/
Enter your User ID and Password
Select 'Payment' > Select 'Briva'
Enter your Virtual Account Number > Enter the amount that you want to pay > Click Send
Enter your password again along with the authentication code from internet bank mToken
Your transaction is completed

name: Permata Virtual Account
description: Only accept payment from Bank Permata

payment_method_instructions.title: ATM PERMATA
instructions: Insert your Permata ATM card > Enter your  ATM PIN
Select Menu 'Transaksi Lainnya' > Select 'Transfer'
Select 'Transfer Antar Rekening Permata Bank'
Enter Virtual Account Number
Select the type of account you are using to transfer (i.e. from Savings account)
Confirm your transaction details displayed

payment_method_instructions.title: Mobile Banking PERMATA
instructions: Open Permata Application
Select 'Transfer' > Select 'Rekening PermataBank'
Enter your Virtual Account Number
Enter the authentication token
Your transaction is completed

payment_method_instructions.title: Internet Banking PERMATA
instructions: Open https://new.permatanet.com and login
Choose 'Pembayaran' > Choose 'Pembayaran Tagihan' > Choose 'Virtual Account'
Choose your source of payment > Choose 'Masukkan Daftar Tagihan Baru'
Enter your Virtual Account Number > Check your detail information and proceed
Enter SMS token response code
Your transaction is completed
